titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of a Borrower's Card: Renée Antoine-May

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: April 6th = "Picene"? June 17 = "Saur"? Oct 24 = "Helles"? s2: May 13 = "Dejoice"? note at bottom = "back"? s3: May 8 = "Wride"? s4: Jan 23 = note after title, or part of title? unclear s7: Mar 10 = "Mouts"? s8: note at bottom = "waith"?

div.note:
1 year 1 vol 180 gave 150f. Deposit 50
subs to April 6th 1930

ab.note: said given back BB. to Miss Beach

bibl.title: Amazing Quest of Mr E. Bliss

May 2 Double Image. will bring back " 8 11

div.head: ANTOINE-MAY.

28. Mr Pinkerton Finds a Body. Feb. 8.
